summary:
A Mod To Add Some Pretty Amazing Followers Of All Kinds Each with their own Skills and Perks!
Please let me know if you make bug fixes so I can post them and give you credit
If you make a video for this mod please send me the youtube link
descriptionHtml:
-Epic Followers

This Mod adds some pretty EPIC followers that are both Female and Male with a lot of different Races as well.  You can find these followers scattered through out Skyrim.   (Locations Below)
The Goal of this mod is to add types of followers people have been wanting for a while, for example The \"Khajiit Follower from this mod, Dav\'ii\". So I Hope You Take The Time To Read This And take a look at the mod in general.  (All Npcs Currently And Being Processed in This Mod Below)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

|   Character Name   |   Race   |   Perk/Skill   |     Armor     |    Location Found    |
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
|   Hareld                 |   Nord  |   Barbarian    |    Scaled     |    Entrance of RiverWood       | 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
|   Dav\'ii                    |  Khajiit |   Theif         |     Leather   |    Near Whiterun Talos Statue|
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Planned Soon To Come NPCS:
Please Leave any Follower Ideas and feedback For What You Would Like to See in this Mod!
As You Can Tell We Need More NPCS
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

|   Character Name   |   Race   |   Perk/Skill   |
-------------------------------------------------------------------
|   Shrek                  |   Orc    |   Barbarian   |
-------------------------------------------------------------------
|   Throthgar            |   Nord  |   Barbarian   |
-------------------------------------------------------------------
|   Robbaz                |   Nord  |    Barbarion   |
|                                        |  Viking  |   (Uses Fists)  |
--------------------------------------------------------------------
|   Gandalf                |  Breton |   Mage         |
--------------------------------------------------------------------

Know Bugs:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
When Dav\'ii is told to part ways he \"leaves your service\" but stays where you leave Him

Please Report Any Bugs If Found
author: KhajiitButtLicker21
